current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: Providing for the appointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , in the class other than Members of Congress, occurring by reason of the expiration of the term of Patricia Q. Stonesifer of Washington, DC, on December 21, 2013, is filled by the appointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey of Pennsylvania.  The appointment is for a term of 6 years, beginning on the later of December 22, 2013, or the date of enactment of this joint resolution.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution
section 5581 of the Revised Statutes of the United States
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Revised Statutes of the United States/s:5581

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SJ 29 IS: Providing for the appointment of Risa Lavizzo-Mourey as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
